section.title: Java User List
section.p: This list is for users of Java Lucene to ask questions, share knowledge, and discuss issues. Do send mail to this list with usage and configuration questions and problems. Also, please send questions to this list to verify your problem before filing issues in JIRA.

section.title: Java Developer List
section.p: This is the list where participating developers of the Java Lucene project meet and discuss issues concerning Lucene internals, code changes/additions, etc. Do not send mail to this list with usage questions or configuration questions and problems.

section.title: Mail Archives
section.p: The Lucene Wiki maintains a list of searchable mailing list archives at http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-java/MailingListArchives. No endorsement is implied by the listing of an archive on the Wiki.

section.title: Other Mailing Lists
section.p: Each Lucene project maintains its own mailing lists. Please refer to the project you are interested in for details on subscribing to its mailing list. For the Lucene TLP General mailing list, go here.
